title: Chapter XX - JUSTICE CENTER FOR THE PROTECTION OF PEOPLE WITH SPECIAL NEEDS
content:
Chapter XX - JUSTICE CENTER FOR THE PROTECTION OF PEOPLE WITH SPECIAL NEEDS
State Regulations

Part 700 - Administrative Adjudication Process For Substantiated Cases Of Abuse And Neglect (§ 700.1 to 700.14)

Part 701 - JUSTICE CENTER CRIMINAL HISTORY INFORMATION CHECKS (§ 701.1 to 701.8)

Part 702 - Use Of Social Security Numbers (§ 702.1 to 702.7)

Part 703 - Justice Center Facility And Provider Disclosure (§ 703.1 to 703.12)

Part 705 - The Justice Center Protocols for Interviewing People Who Receive Services (§ 705.1 to 705.6)

Part 704 - Incident Review Committee Requirement (§ 704.1 to 704.8)

Part 710 - Procedures Of The Surrogate Decision-making Committee Of The New York State Justice Center For The Protection Of People With Special Needs (§ 710.1 to 710.8)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
